【New Update】
1.[New Update]Redesigned the music selection UI,players will be more convenient to view all the music stages
2.[New Update]Locked music stages are now able to be tried and listened
3.[New Update]All of the music stages are now able to be unlocked by coins,gotta unlock em all!
4.[New Update]New gem restore system,gem will restore automatically now! For free!
5.[New Update] Login Reward: collect your free gift every 8 hours!
6.[New Update]Purcahse coins in game will get bonus now, buy more get more!
7.[Bug Fixed] Fix some bugs, game experience is smoother :)

【New Update】
1.""Feel"" the beat with our new haptic feedback feature!
2. The cloud service will save your cars automatically!
3. Test your luck with the new fortune wheel, get your favorite cars and songs for free!
4. We have also refined the UI layout, players will be more convinient to switch between different function module
